project_plan.name: Temperature Converter CLI Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line tool in Python that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion from Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion from Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion from Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion from Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion from Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion from Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Implement user input handling for temperature and desired output unit
Implement main function to orchestrate the conversion based on user inputs
Write tests for each conversion function and user input handling
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
